en.page_title: OpenTrace - The Cross-platform Route Tracing Tool
en.meta_description: OpenTrace is a free, open source, cross-platform GUI for route tracing. Download for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Visualize your network path with MTR support.
en.meta_keywords: OpenTrace, traceroute, route tracing, MTR, network diagnostics, cross-platform, open source, Windows, macOS, Linux, GUI traceroute
en.hero_subtitle: Open Source Visualized Route Tracing Tool for macOS, Windows, and Linux.
en.feat_native_desc: Built with Windows WPF, Linux GTK, and macOS native technologies for a smooth and consistent experience.
en.feat_mtr_desc: Integrated powerful My Traceroute functionality to analyze network path stability and packet loss in real-time.
en.feat_lang_desc: Built-in support for Chinese, English, French, Spanish, Japanese, and Russian.
en.feat_privacy_desc: Supports privacy masking (hide first hops), custom DNS (DoH), and local MMDB IP databases.
en.feat_cli_desc: Supports starting traceroute via CLI arguments, making it easy for script integration.
en.fetching_release: Fetching latest release info from GitHub...
en.download_note_win: Note: Windows users need to install
en.api_error: Cannot connect to GitHub API. Please visit GitHub Releases page directly.
en.og_title: OpenTrace - Open Source Route Tracing Tool
en.og_description: Free, open source, cross-platform GUI for route tracing with MTR support. Download for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

zh.page_title: OpenTrace - 跨平台路由追踪工具
zh.meta_description: OpenTrace 是一款免费、开源的跨平台可视化路由追踪工具 GUI。支持 Windows、macOS 和 Linux。内置 MTR 功能，轻松分析网络路径。
zh.meta_keywords: OpenTrace, 路由追踪, traceroute, MTR, 网络诊断, 跨平台, 开源, Windows, macOS, Linux, 可视化追踪
zh.hero_subtitle: 适用于 macOS, Windows 和 Linux 的开源可视化路由追踪工具。
zh.feat_native_desc: 基于 Windows WPF、Linux GTK 和 macOS 原生技术构建，带来流畅且一致的使用体验。
zh.feat_mtr_desc: 集成了强大的 My Traceroute 功能，实时分析网络路径的稳定性与丢包情况。
zh.feat_lang_desc: 内置中文、英文、法语、西班牙语、日语、俄语，打破语言障碍。
zh.feat_privacy_desc: 支持隐私打码（隐藏前几跳 IP）、自定义 DNS (DoH)、以及加载本地 MMDB IP 数据库。
zh.feat_cli_desc: 支持通过 CLI 参数快速启动追踪，方便脚本集成与极客使用。
zh.fetching_release: 正在从 GitHub 获取最新版本信息...
zh.api_error: 无法连接 GitHub API，请直接访问 GitHub Releases 页面下载。
zh.sponsors_title: 特别鸣谢 & 友情链接
zh.og_title: OpenTrace - 开源路由追踪工具
zh.og_description: 免费、开源的跨平台可视化路由追踪工具 GUI，支持 MTR 功能。可在 Windows、macOS 和 Linux 上下载使用。
